description: PIMS 3799 IW MSP:  Good Practices and Portfolio Learning in GEF Transboundary Freshwater and Marine Legal and Institutional Frameworks

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: This Project strengthens and promotes international and multi-country cooperation, and enhances regime development of regional governance grameworks in international waters. Through adaptive learning methodologies and collaboration with local experts and practitioners, the project develops, promotes and delivers innovative, replicable and targeted experiential learning tools for transboundary water governance for both marine and freshwater ecosystems
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Good Practices and Portfolio L
